General.Name: Klimasan Klima Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Klimasan Klima Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the production and sale of refrigeration products worldwide. It offers beverage and beer coolers, ice cream cabinets, supermarket cabinets, freezers, and wine coolers under the Metalfrio, Klimasan, Senocak, Caravell, and Derby brand names. The company was founded in 1915 and is based in Manisa, Turkey.
General.Address: Manisa Organize Sanayi BOelgesi 1, Manisa, Turkey, 45030
